transcript:
Customer: Hello
Hanji good morning madam
Executive: Haan sir preeti baat kar rahi thi India mart head office se kaise hain aap
Customer: Haan sir haan sir sham ko shayad busy the haan haan kal sham ko shayad busy the aap suniye suniye mera baat main call kiya tha matlab main India mart mein aap 3000 deke ye kya hai to mera phone ek din nahi aa raha hai humko hi karna chahiye phone aisa kyun hai
Executive: Haan sir maine aapko requirement wala ko phone aana chahiye na
Sir dekhiye maine aapko bataya tha na ki aapko teen tariko se business provide hoga jo main hota hai wo by lead hota hai by lead pe jo inquiries aa rahi hai usse aap call karenge call bhi aapko aayega but sir abhi aapko time hi kitna hua hai aapke sirf calls calls hi bataya tha ki aapko starting mein
Customer: Call nahi aa raha hai call aana chahiye aur ek bhi kam nahi mere ko mila hai
Executive: Sir dekhiye aapka business abhi abhi kabhi kabhi start kiya hai ye 25 tarikh ko isne start kiya hai october mein hai na 25 october ko start kiya hai na aapki services abhi start hue agar main bolu to us dhang se ek mahina bhi nahi hua hai sir thoda sa time lagta hai ki aap nayi nayi dukan kholte hain to turant business nahi aata na offline bhi kholte hain to customer banne mein time lagta hai thoda aapko visibility banane mein apna time lagta hai thoda promote karne mein time lagta hai na abhi aapko offline business karte hue kitna time ho chuka hai sir
Customer: Hello
Executive: Ho chuka hai wahi wali baat hai dekhiye haan do saal ho gaya to jaisa aapne starting mein start kiya tha jo customer the wahi to ab nahi hoga same ab dheere dheere hi badhti hai cheeze same waisa hi hai ye bhi aapko thoda time dena padega isme aisa nahi hota hai ki aapne bilkul hi ispe register kiya fir aapko turant call aane lag jayega nahi bilkul offline wala hi scene hai sir online mein bhi ki aapne jaise abhi nayi nayi dukan start ki hai aapko us pe kaam karna padega theek hai kaam karenge usko use karenge call karenge follow up karenge kyunki jo buyer aa raha hai online India mart pe bhi aur google pe bhi to wo aapka catalog dekh ke jab ek bar usko lagega ki haan trusted hai kafi time se connected hai kafi time se India mart ke portal pe tab wo aapko call karega na sir dikhe to pehle aapka business
Customer: Samajh rahe hain aap meri baat
Executive: Hello
Customer: Haan aisa hoga aapko dekhiye aap by lead abhi na aapko aap ek bar use kariye by lead par response lijiye uske baad calls aana start hoga sir aapko abhi to aapko ek mahina bhi nahi hua hai theek hai aur dusra main dekh rahi thi aap jo by lead consume kar rahe hain wo aap search karke consume kar rahe hain wo products add nahi hai to kya karte hain unme deal aap
Customer: Haan hello jaise main aapko bata deti hu ek second ki jaise ye modular kitchen hai aapka ye aapne search karke by lead consume ki hai to isme deal karte hain aap modular kitchen mein
Executive: Haan ji
Executive: Achcha aur ye aluminium modular modular kitchens hai to ye sare products aapne search kiye hain to inko add karna hai panch che kiye the aapne I think ye bhi modular kitchen cabinets stainless steel modular kitchen modular kitchen cabinet auto wagera interior wagera haan ji haan haan ye sab isme deal karte hain to actually aapka add nahi tha to shayad aapko iski by lead wagera nahi dikh rahi hongi hai na isliye search karna pad raha hoga to main ek kaam karti hu main ye wale product na aapke add kar deti hu aapke catalog mein
Customer: Haan ji haan ji add kar dijiye kitchen modular kitchen ek number rakhiyega baki theek hai cabinet wagera haan
Executive: To ye jo cheeze maine aapko naam jo maine aapko che naam bataye hain che ke che add karne hain
Customer: Ji ji nahi modular kitchen aap add kijiyega ek number
Executive: Achcha ek hi add karna hai baki ke
Customer: Modular kitchen achcha nahi modular kitchen cabinet aur drop wagera jo interior ka hai add kijiye theek hai
Executive: Theek hai fir main ek kaam karti hu ye wale add kar deti hu aur sir isme na aapke kuch products hai char jisme aapne na prices mention nahi kar rakhe hain aur catalog ka na jaise hum dukan kholte hain na sir to usme hum apni sari cheeze ekdam acche se rakhte hain na taki hume koi dikkat na ho to aise hi catalog score hota hai usme hume sari apni specification wagera dalni hoti hai to main help karungi aapko is cheez mein ki hume kaise catalog pe apna specification wagera badhana hai theek hai abhi iska jo aapka score hai na wo 65 aa raha hai to aap mujhe ek bar price bata dijiyega main agar add kar dungi wo aapka modular kitchen wala to aap mujhe price bata dijiye
Customer: 1200 1200 square feet 1200 square feet
Executive: 1200 square feet hai aur jo dusra bata rahe the aap cabinet wala same hai
Customer: Haan ek hi ek hi ek hi ek hi hai ek hi hai 1200 tak hai
Executive: Theek hai wardrobe wardrobe haan interior 1200 haan ji haan theek hai to main ek kaam karti hu sir main us ye dono add kar deti hu aapke specification theek kar deti hu aapko dikha dungi kaisa kya hai aur dusri cheez hai sir aapko na mera ye wala number save kar lijiye aap aapko koi bhi problem hoga ya kisi bhi cheez mein query hoga na aap mujhe call karega direct main aapka account handle kar rahi hu theek hai
Customer: Haan haan ji madam ye number aapka paas hi rehta hai kya
Executive: Haan ye number ye personal number hai sir ye mere paas hi rehta hai aur main hi aapka account handle kar rahi hu to aapne jo call kiya tha na kal 9696 wale pe to unhone aapka call mujhe transfer kiya hai to abhi aapka concern jo aapne raise kiya tha na usko main close kar rahi hu apne end se ki maine aapse baat kar li abhi koi dikkat to nahi hai na sir aapko call thoda wait karna padega theek hai main aapko close karungi uske aapko ek mail jayega satisfied mark karega wo mere liye hoga theek hai
Customer: Theek hai madam okay okay main karta hu
Executive: Theek hai thank you so much sir thank you main kar deti hu aapka okay
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer's phone not ringing with buyleads.

- Wants calls and work from IndiaMART.

- Wants modular kitchen product to be added.

- Wants to know why he is not getting buyleads.



Resolution:

- Explained business generation through buyleads.

- Executive will add modular kitchen product to catalog.

- Explained catalog score and specification importance.

- Executive offered direct assistance with account issues.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will add products and fix specifications.

- Customer to receive a satisfaction survey mail.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, catalog, subscription, modular kitchen
